Rules.title: Helpful Hints
Rules.rule: If this is your first time in the city, please check your Extended Texture Budget in your graphics settings and make sure it is turned up so that your textures load properly. Also, ensure that the correct headset and microphone are selected in your voice settings. The default push-to-talk button is 'N' on your keyboard.
